name: Power Tower
description:
You are a square that generates power.

To start the game move towards the square with the floating diamond and press E to bring up the shop menu. To back out of menus press E again.

In the shop you can purchase player upgrades and towers. The game will start once you have purchased your first tower. 

Move carefully, moving costs energy and when you run out it will take some time to start regenerating energy again.

Have fun and give me your feedback in the comments below! \(~_~\)

Controls:

W - move up

A - move left

S - move down

D - move right

E - Interact with shop / Pickup Tower

SHIFT - Radiate energy and charge up towers
